definition: A common greeting or expression used during a specific time of day, typically around midday or early afternoon. It is often used to wish someone a good meal or to acknowledge the start of a mealtime.

examples.german: Ich wünsche dir eine gute Mahlzeit.
examples.english: I wish you a good meal.

examples.german: Mahlzeit ist die traditionelle Grußformel zur Mittagszeit.
examples.english: Mahlzeit is the traditional greeting at lunchtime.
